info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 2:51PM EDT until August 15 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FORSYTH AND NORTHERN DAVIDSON COUNTIES... At 251 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Thomasville, or 10 miles south of Winston-Salem, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Winston-Salem, Lexington, Thomasville, Kernersville, Walkertown, Arcadia, Welcome, Sedge Garden and Belews Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
